exceptions.exn: The reference m was not found in the current environment.

original: assert (bound E) as B. unfold bound. destruct (completeness E) as [m Hm]. exists m. tauto. assert (exists x : R, E x) as Ex. admit. destruct (completeness E B Ex) as [m Hm]. exists (Finite m). split. - intros x Exx. apply Rbar_le. destruct (Hm) as [Hub]. apply Hub. auto. - intros b Hub. apply Rbar_le. destruct b as [b | | ]. + apply Hm. * unfold is_upper_bound. intros. specialize (Hub x H). apply Rbar_le in Hub. simpl in Hub. auto. * auto. + simpl. auto. + elimtype False. destruct (Hub 0). simpl. intros. specialize (Hub x H). inversion Hub. simpl. auto.
